body.name: Casdon Dyson Toys - Ball Vacuum Cleaner - Miniature Replica Toy with Real Function, Bright Colors & True-to-Life Sounds - Kids Cleaning Set - For Children Aged 3+
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 22 hrs 55 mins
FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 22 hrs 55 mins
features: JUST LIKE THE REAL THING: Explore imaginative play with a toy that looks like the real thing from the twist-and-turn ball to the clear cylinder. Encourage creativity with Casdon's Dyson toy range of vacuum toys and styling sets (sold separately)

MULTIPLE WAYS TO PLAY: This toy will have kids zooming around the house picking up small bits and pieces. Please note for safety reasons the vacuum only uses light suction suitable for small pieces of paper and lightweight debris. 4 C batteries required

LEARN THROUGH PLAY: Little ones will enjoy moving around and pretending to do household tasks independently as they learn responsibility and develop valuable skills from coordination to core motor skills

WHAT'S INCLUDED: This set includes the toy replica Dyson ball with whizzing colored balls, twist and turn action, and a removable debris draw, all packaged in a non-color, plastic-free packaging to be kinder to our environment
SUITABLE FOR AGES 3+: Not suitable for children under the age of 3 years due to small parts. Please refer to the product video for assembly instructions
body.description: Product Description This toy vacuum looks and works just like the real thing (down to the very last detail!). the “twist and turn” action works just as smoothly as real Dyson vacuums, allowing little ones to reach even the trickiest of places around the home.As well as staying true to the dyson ball’s ease of use, this vacuum cleaner features light suction suitable for small pieces of paper and lightweight debris, meaning little ones can feel like they make a real difference around the home, gaining that all-important sense of accomplishment. From the Manufacturer Little ones adore role play and pretending that they are doing jobs around the house – just like the grown-ups. This Dyson Ball upright vacuum cleaner has been specially designed to be true to life, right down to the last detail so your little helper will really feel part of your world while developing essential life skills. Casdons' Toy Dyson Vacuum is a direct replica of the latest “Ball” model. This realistic toy features a simulated cyclone action with colourful balls, so you can see it working. It also ‘Twists and Turns’ just like the real thing. This great toy also has real suction from the foot of the vacuum that is designed to pick up small pieces of paper waste or small poly beads. This links to a removable dustbin at the back, the child can easily take this out to be emptied and the cleaning can start all over again. Realistic role play for exploring imagination and developing social skills, Replica design with bright colours for visual stimulation, Play encourages the development of hand-to-eye co-ordination, Working suction and cyclone action for understanding cause and effect, Manoeuvrability of toy develops problem solving and motor skills, Independent play encourages exploration and discovery, true to life sounds for added realism and aural stimulation, Pre-schoolers learn by acting out and copying what their parents do, making the range of role-play toys from Casdon Toys ideal learning vehicles for youngsters wanting to emulate their parents. Casdons Dyson Ball replica is the best toy vacuum on the market. 63cm’s high 4 x C batteries required.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Grands loved it. Looks just like my real one. Even vaccums!! Great toy for great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This was a SUCCESSFUL Christmas Gift!
reviews.reviewText: It does, indeed, pick up some dirt, but the suction hole is TINY, so if you want to have this be useful, your child's vacuum passes will need to be very close together.otherwise, this was a huge success at Christmas ~~ it does "work", or you can just have the colorful balls swirl around to look like it is vacuuming like a real Dyson. Great branding for that company!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fun but not the most sturdy
reviews.reviewText: My son LOVED this when he first got it. He played with it all day long. It’s possible he wore it down a little bit (even though he only had it one day), but the next day, it wouldn’t stand up on its own. It gets stuck easily and I have to push down the back wheels to get it to stand. I’m still giving it a good rating because my toddler is obsessed with it, but it’s not super sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable, and fun
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this for our granddaughter. Unfortunately, we didn’t get to see her use it much but I was told that she just loves playing with it. It does work to pick things up but the area that has section is about a half an inch square. So you need to line it up exactly on top of something light for it to work. It’s a toy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 17 month old loves it
reviews.reviewText: Looks great, 2 step assembly, our 17 month old loves it. It does actually clean if you get the debris under the tic tac side hole!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great for pretend play but features could use some work.
reviews.reviewText: So this vacuum is a great pretend toy, my daughter LOVES it ad its so cute and fun for her to play with. It looks real, it actually sucks a little, it rolls around great, it was easy to put together, and the beads swirling around like "dirt" is a nice touch. The beads and the suction can run separately too so both do not have to be on at the same time. A few notes if you like this: The suction power is like its for fun only (for kids), do not expect them to be able to clean like a normal vacuum. It does NOT stand on its own, which is annoying but if you click out the little compartment slightly that holds the dirt it does, I think that is how its meant to stand. Its kind of heavy for a toddler toy so when they drop it it does seem like it could break but our hasn't.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable and Entertaining
reviews.reviewText: My toddler uses this probably ten times a day. He follows me around while I vacuum, he pulls it onto the couch to cuddle it, he bangs it against stuff and it hasn’t broken yet. Definitely worth the purchase and the fact that it really looks like it’s vacuuming is such a selling point. Great for gifting and great for keeping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable and fun!
reviews.reviewText: My 2 year old always wants to help vacuum so this toy brought the biggest smile to her face when she opened it! It is the perfect size and easy for her to use. It has a button to turn on the “dust cup” and make the colorful balls pop and another switch to turn on the vacuum. My daughter can push and manipulate this toy all over the house!

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect Miniature Replica for Little Ones!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the Casdon Dyson Ball Miniature Replica for my 19-month-old child, and it has been an absolute hit in our household! From the moment it arrived, my little one couldn't get enough of it.This miniature Dyson Ball is not only adorable but also incredibly realistic. It's the perfect size for tiny hands and encourages imaginative play. My child loves to mimic me while I'm cleaning, and this toy allows them to do just that.The attention to detail on this replica is impressive. The suction action and the tiny colorful balls that swirl around in the clear cylinder make it even more exciting for my child. It's as if they have their own little vacuum cleaner.What I appreciate the most is the quality and durability of this toy. It's built to withstand the enthusiasm of a curious toddler. It's been dropped, banged, and played with for hours, and it's still in excellent condition.I can't recommend the Casdon Dyson Ball Miniature Replica enough for children aged 3 and up. Even at 19 months, my child absolutely loves it. It's a fantastic way to introduce them to cleaning and responsibility through play. This toy has brought so much joy and entertainment to our household, making it a worthwhile purchase.
Excelente empaque, la aspiradora esta muy bonita. gracias.es el juguete ideal para Navidad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Lovely little toy seems quite sturdy and realistic
Super, fonctionne très bien avec 4 piles non fournies.Je recommande 👍
